Title: DefaultAndZipTemplate.xaml (Build Process Template for TFS 2010)
Description: Just the given default build process template in TFS 2010 plus one additional activity to put the drop folder content into a zip file located in the same folder.
HomeWiki:
This project just contains another build process template for TFS 2010.
It is based on the default build process template given with TFS 2010 and adds one additional activity to put the drop folder content into a zip file located in the same folder.
It uses 7-Zip and assumes that 7-Zip was previously installed in "C:\Program Files".
